key.name: server-host
key.description: The host name or ip address of the Ivona server.

key.name: server-port
key.description: The port of the Ivona server.

key.name: sample-frequency
key.description: Sample frequency to use with Ivona.

key.name: min-cap-let
key.description: IvonaMinCapLet overrides DefaultCapLetRecognition. Set to: 1 for "icon" - play icon even if default is "none" 2 for "spell" - spell "capital" even if default is "none" or "icon"

key.name: speaker-name
key.description: Ivona Speaker (depends on Ivona version) Jacek or Ewa for pl, Jennifer for en, Carmen for ro

key.name: delimiters
key.description: Delimiters for message splitting. Do not change if not sure!

key.name: debug
key.description: Whether debugging is enabled in the ivona output module or not.

key.name: debug-file
key.description: debug-file specifies the file where the debugging information should be stored (note that the log is overwritten each time the module starts)
